title: Elephants: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 949 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 1040L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Y
description: Elephants: Giant Mammals explores the interesting lives of the worlds largest land animal. From the differences in species to the diversity of their habitat, this book explore what makes elephants so special.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
